Just wanted to let everybody know that the latest version of Jtest! 
is completely compatible with JUnit.  JTest can load and execute all 
of your existing JUnit test classes.  It can export its automatically 
generated test cases into a test class.  It can also create a test 
class template when you wish to define your own test class.

In addition to all the functionality you find in JUnit, JTest will 
automatically generate test cases to test the construction of a class 
(assuring you that there is no unexpected input that will cause a 
method to throw an exception).  The tool also does static-analysis 
(automatic enforcement of best coding practices), regression testing, 
coverage analysis (for both JUnit and Jtest generated test classes), 
and checks Design By Contract.

If anybody is interested in seeing a demo, please contact me as I 
will be scheduling several over the next few weeks.

You can reach me at:

dmccaw@...
888-305-0041 x1209

For more info, visit http://www.parasoft.com.

Thanks,
David McCaw
